pD * message: Here you will see awesome Firefox tips that are just for you.
You can use the CTRL+T keyboard shortcut to open a new tab faster!
You can use the CTRL+W keyboard shortcut to close a tab faster!
You can use the CTRL+R keyboard shortcut to reload the page faster!
You can use the CTRL+SHIFT+F keyboard shortcut to toggle the full screen view quickly!
pD * rationale: You toggle the full screen view a lot.

pD * message: Use the CTRL+F keyboard shortcut to quickly find a word in the page.
pD * rationale: You use the find tool a lot.

pD * message: Use the CTRL+G keyboard shortcut to quickly find the next occurence of a word in the page.
pD * rationale: You use the find again tool a lot.

pD * message: Use the CTRL+L keyboard shortcut to easily select and change the current page address.
pD * rationale: You frequently select the address bar.

pD * message: You can use the CTRL+D keyboard shortcut to quickly bookmark the current page.
You can use the CTRL+SHIFT+E keyboard shortcut to open Tabs Groups faster.
Use the CTRL+C keyboard shortcut to easily copy a selection.
Use the CTRL+V keyboard shortcut to paste a copied element.
Use the CTRL+9 keyboard shortcut to switch to the last open tab faster.
pD * rationale: You fequently switch to the last tab back and forth.

pD * message: The DownThemAll extension lets you view and manage your downloads easier and faster!
The Turn Off the Lights extension lets you watch videos as if you were in the cinema.
pD * title: Turn Off the Lights and enjoy!
pD * rationale: You like watching videos in Firefox.

pD * message: The Reddit Enhancement Suite extension enhances your reddit browsing experience.
Gives you a handy "Add to Wish List" button, letting you add any product from any website to your Amazon wish list with just a few clicks.
pD * title: Amazon Add to Wish List Button

pD * message: Lets you pin images and upload your Pins to Pinterest quickly and easily with a special toolbar button.
Lets you search IMDB by selecting some text and using a right-click.
Lets you visit your Favorite Facebook quickly and easily by adding a special Facebook Button to your Toolbar
Automatically saves and restores the state of some or all of your windows and tabs.
pD * rationale: You restore your Firefox session frequently.

pD * message: Integrate Google Calendar with Firefox! No extra login needed.
pD * rationale: You visit Google Calendar a lot.

pD * message: Helps you manage and view your tabs more easily by showing tabs like a tree.
Get weather forecasts from AccuWeather.com in your Firefox in an unobtrusive way!
pD * rationale: You visit known weather forecast websites frequently.

pD * message: Clean up your Addon Manager with this extension.
You find private windows useful? This extension lets you open tabs that are private.
Lets you display tabs in a tiled layout in Firefox.
Stylish lets you restyle Firefox and many popular websites like Google, Facebook, etc. with themes and skins.
Capture and organize your academic research all in your Firefox.
pD * rationale: You visit some well-known academic websites frequently.

pD * message: Switch profiles easily and smoothly right from your main menu.
Are an easy way to organize a lot of tabs. You can visually group related tabs, switch between groups, and quickly search through all of your tabs to switch to a specific one.
Add the power of Google Translate's automatic translation to your browser!
pD * rationale: You use popular translation web apps.

pD * message: Brings your core dev tools together with some powerful new ones that will extend your ability to work across multiple platforms from one place.
pD * rationale: You use Firefox developer tools frequently.

pD * message: Private Browsing allows you to browse the Internet without saving any information about which sites and pages you’ve visited.
pD * rationale: You edit your browsing history frequently.

pD * message: Allow you to always keep your favorite websites like Facebook, Gmail and Twitter open and just a click away.
pD * rationale: You use some well-known web apps frequently.

pD * message: Smart Keywords are an easy way to search specific websites directly from the Firefox Location bar.
pD * rationale: You visit known websites such as Wikipedia that have specialized search engines.
